attributes.action: Stop multi millionaires being in government most of all chancellors.
attributes.additional_details: Because its a crime that we are governed by people that don't live working class lives.
attributes.background: Only accept MPs that are not from multi million pounds families only allow people that know how it is to pay a bill and know how much the last one was.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.

Decisions on whether to elect specific individuals as MPs are a matter for the electorate, not the UK Government.
